title: Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument: Donate
body: Donate       Thank you for your interest in making a donation to Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument. You can make a gift to benefit the park either directly to the National Park Service or to our non-profit Friends group. If you make the gift directly to Alibates, the entire gift will be used for the purpose you identify. No administrative costs are deducted from your gift. To give directly to Alibates, please mail your check to: Superintendent P.O. Box 1460 Fritch, TX 79036 Please also include a short letter specifying the nature of your gift.
